fullplot: A man who has avoided his wife and child at home has a change of heart after an imposed stay in his own parents' loft.
plot: A man who has avoided his wife and child at home has a change of heart after an imposed stay in his own parents' loft.
title: Momma's Man

tomatoes.consensus: Moody yet touching, Momma's Man successfully illustrates with elegant simplicity the struggles of a man consumed with his adolescence.
